title.rendered: STEDI HORIZONTAL TYPE PUSH SWITCHES TO SUIT TOYOTA

content.rendered:
Toyota OEM Replacement Push Switches for Landcruiser 80 Series & some Hilux <2005 models that replace the blank switches supplied in the cabin from factory for more relevant operational switches that are available in different prints depending on the attached device.

OVERVIEW

Our range of 80 Series Landcruiser Toyota Push Switches maintains the factory look and feel of your vehicle with a wide variety of prints from LED Light Bars, Driving Lights, and Rear Lights.

DASH ILLUMINATION

Our OEM Push Switches have dual illumination lighting up the right half from the dash illumination off your vehicle and the left once the selected device is active. Some of our push switches are available in a variety of illumination colours.

FITMENT

Fitting in a wide range of Toyota models with a full list of compatibility in the specs below. The total height of 24mm and width of 43mm, if these dimensions do not match those of your vehicle we also have Old Toyota OEM Push Switches.

DETAILS

KEY FEATURES

  • Green LED Back Lighting
  • Right Light is Active when Power is ON
  • Left Light is Active when Dash Lights are ON
  • Laser Etched print ensure our print will never rub off with use
  • Rated at 3A on 12v
  • Excellent OEM matching design

COMPATIBLE TOYOTA MAKES

  • Toyota Landcruiser 80 Series | 1990 to 1997
  • Toyota Hilux Pre 2005 (some models)
  • 78/79 series Landcruiser (old steel Dash model only)
  • 75 Series Landcruiser (all models)

Please ensure a our switches are always wired through a fused relay.

Please note we have two different OEM style Toyota switches, if your vehicle make is not listed above, please view our other product listings.

SPECIFICATIONS

BACK LIGHT COLOUR Green
SURFACE SIZE DIMENSIONS 43mm x 24mm
RATED 3A @ 12v

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • Toyota 80 Series Push Button Switch
  • Connector with wire tails
  • Wiring Diagram

excerpt.rendered: Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
